content:
[
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to computers and internet",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 1,
    "no_code_solution": "A website that connects users with libraries and community centers that offer free computer and internet access",
    "content_solution": "A guide on how to find and utilize free computer and internet access resources in your community",
    "competitors": "There are some websites that offer this service, such as librarytechnology.org, but they are not user-friendly and lack a comprehensive database.",
    "differentiator": "Our website will have a user-friendly interface and a comprehensive database of all library and community center resources in the US."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to educational resources",
    "importance": 5,
    "required_expertise": 2,
    "no_code_solution": "A monthly subscription service that delivers educational resources to users' homes",
    "content_solution": "A YouTube channel with educational videos and tutorials for users with limited access to educational resources",
    "competitors": "There are some companies that offer educational resources, such as KiwiCo and Little Passports, but they are geared towards children and are not affordable for low-income families.",
    "differentiator": "Our subscription service will be affordable and cater to adults as well as children. Our YouTube channel will offer a wide variety of content for all ages."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to healthy food options",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 3,
    "no_code_solution": "A meal delivery service that focuses on healthy and affordable options for low-income families",
    "content_solution": "A blog with healthy and affordable recipes that can be made with limited resources",
    "competitors": "There are some meal delivery services that focus on healthy options, such as HelloFresh and Blue Apron, but they are not affordable for low-income families.",
    "differentiator": "Our meal delivery service will be affordable and cater to low-income families. Our blog will focus on recipes that can be made with limited resources, such as a small kitchen and limited cooking equipment."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to mental health resources",
    "importance": 4,
    "required_expertise": 4,
    "no_code_solution": "A mobile app that connects users with licensed therapists for virtual therapy sessions",
    "content_solution": "A podcast with mental health experts discussing various topics related to mental health",
    "competitors": "There are some mobile apps that offer virtual therapy sessions, such as BetterHelp and Talkspace, but they are not affordable for low-income families.",
    "differentiator": "Our mobile app will be affordable and offer a sliding scale payment system for low-income families. Our podcast will have a diverse range of mental health experts and focus on topics that are relevant to low-income communities."
  },
  {
    "problem": "Limited access to affordable housing options",
    "importance": 3,
    "required_expertise": 5,
    "no_code_solution": "A website that connects users with affordable housing options in their area",
    "content_solution": "A blog with tips and resources for finding and applying for affordable housing",
    "competitors": "There are some websites that offer affordable housing options, such as Affordable Housing Online, but they are not user-friendly and lack a comprehensive database.",
    "differentiator": "Our website will have a user-friendly interface and a comprehensive database of all affordable housing options in the US. Our blog will also offer resources for navigating the affordable housing application process."
  }
]
